item.title: Trump officialsâ€™ meeting with Russian in Miami spurs questions about latest Ukraine proposal
item.description: The Miami meeting included special envoy Steve Witkoff, Jared Kushner and Kirill Dmitriev, who leads the Russian Direct Investment Fund.

item.title: G20 summit in South Africa adopts declaration despite U.S. boycott, opposition
item.description: A Group of 20 leaders' summit in South Africa adopted a declaration addressing the climate crisis and other global challenges on Saturday.

item.title: Trump on Marjorie Taylor Greene's resignation: She 'went BAD'
item.description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene on Friday said she would resign in early January, after saying President Donald Trump unfairly criticized her.

item.title: Russia's Ryabkov says potential Putin-Trump summit is on the agenda
item.description: The possibility of another meeting between Putin and Trump is on the agenda, a senior Russian diplomat has said.

item.title: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene will resign after fallout with Trump
